pages.text: $(li)The Armor Stand is a block that allows you to hold and display Armors and Tools.$(br)$(li)To use it, first you have to place the Armor Stand.
$(li)Right click on it while you are holding an Armor or Tool in your hand.
$(li)If you want to recover the placed item, just right click on the Armor Stand again while you are not holding any item in your hand.
